#### Event and Site
```{r results_missing_patterns_template_event_site, , echo = FALSE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE, results = 'show', cache = FALSE, eval = TRUE}
t <- age_gap %>%
     dplyr::select(TEMPLATE) %>%
     gather(key = identifier, value = value, -individual_id, -event_name -site) %>%
     mutate(missing = is.na(value),
           individual_id = factor(individual_id))
left_join(t,
          master$lookups_fields) %>%
    ggplot(., aes(x = label, y = individual_id, fill = missing)) +
    geom_raster() +
    facet_grid(event_name~.) +
    theme_bw()

```
